## Pre-PR Checklist

Run these:

- [ ] `pnpm type-check`
- [ ] `pnpm format:check`
- [ ] `pnpm lint`
- [ ] `pnpm build`
- [ ] `pnpm i18n:check` (if applicable)

## Type

- [ ] 🐛 Bug fix
- [ ] ✨ Feature
- [ ] 💥 Breaking change
- [ ] 📚 Docs
- [ ] ♻️ Refactor
- [ ] ⚡ Performance
